title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia                         Ashton A view of Ashton village, and the role of the Blackstone Canal  Duration:2 minutes, 24 seconds                                Hopedale A short tour of Hopedale, and its rise from commune to company town  Duration:2 minutes, 44 seconds                                Slatersville A tour of Slatersville, America's First Mill Village  Duration:1 minute, 54 seconds                                Whitinsville A short look at Whitinsville, and the Whitin Machine Shop.  Duration:2 minutes, 33 seconds
